citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 10:45am on
September 12, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by arriving at the facility and reporting to the
security building. The security officer informed the inspector that the facility is closed, there are no more animals at the
facility, and there are no employees who report to the building previously occupied by the business. There is no
forwarding phone number. Reporting to APHIS significant business changes, such as the closure of a facility, is required
in the Animal Welfare Act under §2.1(b)(1). Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is
a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 10:45am on 
September 12, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by arriving at the facility and reporting to the 
security building. The security officer informed the inspector that the facility is closed, there are no more animals at the 
facility, and there are no employees who report to the building previously occupied by the business. There is no 
forwarding phone number. Reporting to APHIS significant business changes, such as the closure of a facility, is required 
in the Animal Welfare Act under §2.1(b)(1). Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is 
a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
